author: Football Italia staff
title: Report: Cellino recovered from COVID-19
description: There are reports Brescia President Massimo Cellino has recovered from COVID-19, without realising he had ever contracted the virus.
content:
There are reports Brescia President Massimo Cellino has recovered from COVID-19, without realising he had ever contracted the virus.
The vast ramping up of testing in recent days, particularly in the Lombardy region, has found a significant number of people … [+999 chars]
